aththanagalla saukhya waidya niladhari karyalaya ha eekabaddhawa dengu uwadura pradeshayen thurankara damime pulul meheyumak aarambha kirimata aththanagalla pradeshiya sabhawa piyawara gena atha.masa hayaka kalasimawak athulatha kriyathmaka wana me dengu mardana wyapruthiya sandaha dainika sewaye yedawimata kamkaruwan athulu sewakayan 40 denaku bandawa ganimatada thiranaya kara atha.gampaha disthrikkaye dengu wyapruthiya wadima palath palana aayathana athurin hatharawana sthanayata aththanagalla pradeshiya sabhawa pathwa thibe.

manawa himikam mandalaye sasiwarayata perathuwa shri lanka hamudawa wisin pawathwana lada parikshanayak mangin yuddhayedi samanya wasiyan miyayame kisidu siduwimakata aarakshaka hamuda waga kiwa yuthu nathayi thindu kirima pilibandawa â€œkanassallaâ€ pala kala sahakara rajya lekamwaraya, emangin sabawinma siduwuye swadhina parikshanayak pawathwimata aanduwa awankawama sudanam da yanna pilibandawa jathyanthara prajawa thula pawathina sakaya thawath thiwra wima bawa da pawasiya.

thiranawukarasu (bi. as. si) sangitha adhyakshanaya â€“ em. ke. roksami githa sankhyawa - 04 githa: pagena apa hata athwal - sujatha aththanayaka (jorj lesli ranasinha) aasha mawanna dase - ech. aar. jothipala, anjalin gunathilaka (jorj lesli ranasinha) mal kakuli komali - ech. aar. jothipala (rawilal wimaladharma) eeka kaliti baddi lajili - miltan mallawaaarachchi (rawilal wimaladharma) githa poth - shanthi pothhala - maradana nalu niliyan â€“ gamini fonseka, nita pranandu, swarna kahawita, baptis pranandu, ech.

lankawa dekada kirimata mana balana demala koti dayasporawa pamanak nowa, ema wadapiliwelata ulpandam demin lankawata hathurukam karana mulu batahira lokayamath, lankawa yatath wijithayak bawata harawa ganimata mana balamin sitina indiyawath, rajapaksha aanduwa parajaya kara thamange abhimathartha itukara ganimata mana balamin siti awasthawaka, ema aanduwa asthawara kara, hathuranta rata pawadimata katayuthu kirimen, champika ranawaka, athuraliye rathana himi, gnyanasara himi yana piris, thaman mona jathiye pudgalayan dayi mulu lokayatama penwa atha. 2017 juni 20 pawathi madhya sakachchawakadi magalkande sudaththa himi aanduwata kiya sitiye champika ranawakata, athuraliye himith, gnyanasara himith pasugiya wakawanuwe ki dewal karanne nam, owun (enam bodubala senawa) deshapalanayen iwath wimata sudanam bawayi.
